summary: Do you think Skyrim's trolls (including Armored trolls) are too weak, too slow or too small? Then I think this is the mod for you!
descriptionHtml:
[CENTER][COLOR=#c00000][FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=7][B][U]The Troll Overhaul[/U][/B][/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR][/CENTER][line]

Do you think Skyrim's trolls (including Armored trolls) are too weak, too slow or too small? Then I think this is the mod for you!

This is my first mod, [B][U]but it still works properly![/B][/U] I would appreciate some constructive criticism!


[SIZE=4][B][U]Change Log[/U][/B][/SIZE][line]

[B][I][U]1.2)[/U][/I][/B] <Some more Trolls added throughout Skyrim

[B][I][U]1.1)[/U][/I][/B] <More Subtle Increase Speed Optional File Added
<Size Change Only Version Optional File Added

[B][I][U]1.0)[/U][/I][/B] <Trolls are 1.2 times their original size, and their level is now always 1.2 the player's. (Vanilla= lvl. 14)
<Frost Trolls are 1.25 times their original size, and their level is now always 1.6 times the players. (Vanilla= lvl. 22)
<Armored Trolls have the same changes in player leveling, but no changes in size so that they can fit through doors.
<Udefrytke is now 1.8 times his original size and levels 1.8x the player. (Vanilla= lvl.22)
<All trolls are x1.5 their original speed.

[B][U][SIZE=4]Alternate Versions[/SIZE][/U][/B][line]

<Size Change Only (Only the Size of the Trolls is Changed) - Suggested by Banjack [Main File]
<More Subtle Increase in Speed (Speed of Trolls is 115 rather than 150) - Suggested by kutsujutsu [Optional File]

[B][U][SIZE=4]Planned Updates[/SIZE][/U][/B][line]

<This mod will not be updated here any longer, instead I am working on "[I]Trolls of Skyrim[/I]" on my new account [I]KigamNogard[/I]. New Features within that mod will include:
-[I]Aspen Trolls[/I], a new troll species with orange fur that primarily inhabit the Rift.
-[I]Hulking Armored Trolls[/I], are tougher, and faster version of the original armored trolls, but are more expensive.
-More Trolls throughout Skyrim.

[CENTER][B][U][I]Please Endorse, Share & Give Feedback![/U][/B][/I]

[B][I][U] ***Feel free to post your ideas on how to better this mod in the comment section of the mod!***[/U][/I][/B][/CENTER]
author: GuitarZeppole

files.name: The Troll Overhaul_Version 1
files.changelogHtml:
Trolls speed changed to 1.5 (1.0 is Vanilla)
Troll= Resized x1.2 & PC level multiplier x1.2
Frost Troll= Resized x1.25 & PC level multiplier x1.6
Udefrytke= Resized x1.8 & PC level multiplier x1.8
